name: Business Kaiju
description:
Game made for the "Mini Jam 81: Kaiju" GameJam.

Enjoy 6 sidescrolling levels, some cutscenes and even some boss battles based on a rythm minigame!

Grow your business and become the biggest business Kaiju in the history!

Master and learn the levels to get a higher score!

Made by: Mirko, Giacomo, Lorenzo, Tommaso, Isaia.
